Events that occurred on 31 August

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1937 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 15.
1938 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 33.
1938 â€“ J.R.R. Tolkien submits the finished version of Farmer Giles of Ham to Allen and Unwin, but it is rejected.
1953 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 140a.
1962 - Voice actor Dee Bradley Baker is born.
1980 - Amon Hen 46 is published.
2015 - Journeys & Destinations is published.
2017 - Tolkien Calendar 2018 is published.

content.title: In Arda
content.content: Note: Months of the Shire Calendar only have 30 days, so no events have nor will happen on the 31st.
